Question & Options:
Which statements accurately reflect the relationships and roles of the characters in *The Batman*?
Options:
A. A) Riddler targeted Don Mitchell Jr. due to a personal motive.
B. B) Riddler's actions directly connected him to Batman.
C. C) Batman participated in recovery efforts after Riddler's actions.
D. D) Riddler was a friend of Batman.
Correct Answer: A) Riddler targeted Don Mitchell Jr. due to a personal motive., B) Riddler's actions directly connected him to Batman., C) Batman participated in recovery efforts after Riddler's actions.
